description: Dashboard for Spring Boot2.1 Statistics(based on Spring Boot2 Statistic by micrometer-prometheus).

targets.expr: sum by(pod)(irate( http_server_requests_seconds_count{uri!~".*actuator.*", uri!~".*prometheus*", uri!~"/health", uri!~"/info", uri!~"root", project="$project",env="$env", application="$application"}[15s] ))

sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace", instance=~"$instance", area="nonheap"})*100/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace",instance=~"$instance", area="nonheap"})

irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*", uri!~".*prometheus*", uri!~"/health", uri!~"/info", uri!~"root"}[15s]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*", uri!~".*prometheus*", uri!~"/health", uri!~"/info", uri!~"root"}[15s])

rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*", uri!~".*prometheus*", uri!~"/health", uri!~"/info", uri!~"root"}[15s]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace", exception="None", uri!~".*actuator.*", uri!~".*prometheus*", uri!~"/health", uri!~"/info", uri!~"root"}[15s])

irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace", uri!~".*actuator.*", uri!~".*prometheus*", uri!~"/health", uri!~"/info", uri!~"root"}[15s])

hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace"} / hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace"}

hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace"} / hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace"}

hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_sum{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace"} / hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_count{instance=~"$instance", application="$application", project="$project", env="$env", namespace="$namespace"}

title: Spring Statistics
